cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: 2(diš@t)-kam-ma-še3! mušen-e ku6-ra ⸢in⸣ [...]
ku6 lipiš tuku a2 nam-ur-sag-ga2#!? [...]
muru9 dugud-gin7 ni2 ki bi2-ib2-us2 [...]
in mušen-e a-na mu-ni-in-dub2-ba ša3-še3! nu-mu-⸢un⸣-⸢na⸣-an-gid2
gu2 surx(SAG) ba-da-an-gar inim BUR2-bi im-me
2(diš@t)-kam-ma-še3! ku6-e mušen-ra mu-⸢na⸣-ni-ib-gi4-gi4
a2-ur2 gu2-guru5 giri3 su#?-ul-su#!?-ul KA x eme sal-sal
nam-nu-zu-a-ta KA e-da-ra-HAR ni2-zu umun2 li-bi2-ak
mah gu7-gu7 sag#? šu zi bi2-ib2-du11-ga kisal-e šed6! si-si
kisal-luh tur e2 ⸢sa⸣ lax(ME)-e eš2! mu-ri-ib2-sar-re
muhaldim {lu2}lunga?-e i3-du8 e2 ti-la zi mu-da-ri-eš
mušen nam-mah-gu10 egir-bi nu-zukumx(|LAL2.SAR|)-zukumx(|LAL2.SAR|) bar-ga2 en3 li-bi2-tar
si-ga kal-ga-ga2 nu-mu-⸢e⸣-⸢da⸣-zu#? ⸢inim⸣ u3-bu-bu-ul i3-bala!
nig2-ak-ga2 ki-bi nu-mu-x-x diri-še3! ni2 sun5-ni-ib
inim-zu nam-bur2-ra im-da-ab#?-tum3 ni2-zu ⸢ad⸣ li-bi-gi4
ga2-e ku6-me-en he2-gal2 AB sikil-la teš2-bi ⸢gar⸣-gar#?-me-en
du8 mah nindaba gal-gal dingir-re-ne-ka sag il2-la DU?-me-en
{d}ašnan-gin7 ša3#?-gar#? kalam-ma-ke4 ba-gal2-e-en [...]-⸢tah⸣-ni ga2-e-me-en
ug3-e geštux(|GIŠ.TUG2|)-ga ma-du3-du3 igi-bi mu-e-ši-gal2
kur ezem-gin7 mu-e-da-hul2!?-e en3 tar-gu10 i3-gal2
nig2-gal-gal a-na me-dim2-ma-zu gur4-ra-zu#? ga-ri-ib-zu
sun7-na ⸢inim⸣ lul-la bala-zu šu-zu ga-ba-ni-ib-si
u4-bi-a ku6-e mušen-ra sa2 im-si-si-ge
si-⸢ga⸣ lul-ba a2-ba mu-un-DU-DU
u4 mušen gud3-bi zi-ga-a-gin7 amar-bi-še3! ⸢nig2⸣-gu7-bi tum3-de3
ku6-e ki si-ga a2-ba mu-un-[...]
